tagblock.name: Sound Globals
tagblock.comment: For first person sounds to the left of you
For first person sounds between your ears
For first person sounds to the right of you

float32.name: Magnetism Friction
float32.tooltip: how much the crosshair slows over enemies

float32.name: Magnetism Adhesion
float32.tooltip: how much the crosshair sticks to enemies

float32.name: Inconsequential Target Scale
float32.tooltip: scales magnetism level for inconsequential targets like infection forms

float32.name: Seconds To Start
float32.tooltip: how long you must be pegged before you start sprinting

float32.name: Seconds To Full Speed
float32.tooltip: how long you must sprint before you reach top speed

float32.name: Decay Rate
float32.tooltip: how fast being unpegged decays the timer (seconds per second)

float32.name: Full Speed Multiplier
float32.tooltip: how much faster we actually go when at full sprint

float32.name: Pegged Magnitude
float32.tooltip: how far the stick needs to be pressed before being considered pegged

float32.name: Pegged Angular Threshold
float32.tooltip: how far off straight up (in degrees) we consider pegged

float32.name: Look Peg Threshold
float32.tooltip: [0,1] magnitude of yaw for pegged acceleration to kick in

float32.name: Look Yaw Acceleration Time
float32.tooltip: time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect

float32.name: Look Yaw Acceleration Scale
float32.tooltip: maximum effect of a pegged look (scales last value in the look function below)

float32.name: Look Pitch Acceleration Time
float32.tooltip: time for a pegged look to reach maximum effect

float32.name: Look Pitch Acceleration Scale
float32.tooltip: maximum effect of a pegged look (scales last value in the look function below)

float32.name: Look Autoleveling Scale
float32.tooltip: 1 is fast, 0 is none, > 1 will probably be really fast

int16.name: Minimum Autoleveling Ticks
int16.tooltip: amount of time player needs to move and not look up or down for autolevelling to kick in

degree.name: Minimum Angle For Vehicle Flipping
degree.tooltip: 0 means the vehicle's up vector is along the ground, 90 means the up vector is pointing straight up

float32.name: Minimum Action Hold Time
float32.tooltip: time that player needs to press ACTION to register as a HOLD

tagblock.name: Difficulty
tagblock.comment: scale values for enemy health and damage settings

float32.name: Easy Enemy Damage
float32.tooltip: enemy damage multiplier on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Enemy Damage

float32.tooltip: enemy damage multiplier on hard difficulty

float32.name: Easy Infection Forms
float32.tooltip: toughness of infection forms (may be negative) on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Infection Forms

tagblock.comment: difficulty-affecting values for enemy ranged combat settings

float32.name: Easy Rate of Fire
float32.tooltip: enemy rate of fire scale on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Rate of Fire
float32.tooltip: enemy rate of fire scale on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Rate of Fire
float32.tooltip: enemy rate of fire scale on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Rate of Fire
float32.tooltip: enemy rate of fire scale on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Projectile Error
float32.tooltip: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Projectile Error
float32.tooltip: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Projectile Error
float32.tooltip: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Projectile Error
float32.tooltip: enemy projectile error scale, as a fraction of their base firing error. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Burst Error
float32.tooltip: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-burst shot distance. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Burst Error
float32.tooltip: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-burst shot distance. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Burst Error
float32.tooltip: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-burst shot distance. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Burst Error
float32.tooltip: enemy burst error scale; reduces intra-burst shot distance. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy New Target Delay
float32.tooltip: enemy new-target delay scale factor. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal New Target Delay
float32.tooltip: enemy new-target delay scale factor. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard New Target Delay
float32.tooltip: enemy new-target delay scale factor. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible New Target Delay
float32.tooltip: enemy new-target delay scale factor. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Burst Separation
float32.tooltip: delay time between bursts scale factor for enemies. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Burst Separation
float32.tooltip: delay time between bursts scale factor for enemies. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Burst Separation
float32.tooltip: delay time between bursts scale factor for enemies. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Burst Separation
float32.tooltip: delay time between bursts scale factor for enemies. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Target Tracking
float32.tooltip: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Target Tracking
float32.tooltip: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Target Tracking
float32.tooltip: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Target Tracking
float32.tooltip: additional target tracking fraction for enemies. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Target Leading
float32.tooltip: additional target leading fraction for enemies. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Target Leading
float32.tooltip: additional target leading fraction for enemies. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Target Leading
float32.tooltip: additional target leading fraction for enemies. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Target Leading
float32.tooltip: additional target leading fraction for enemies. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Overcharge Chance
float32.tooltip: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Overcharge Chance
float32.tooltip: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Overcharge Chance
float32.tooltip: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Overcharge Chance
float32.tooltip: overcharge chance scale factor for enemies. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Special Fire Delay
float32.tooltip: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Special Fire Delay
float32.tooltip: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Special Fire Delay
float32.tooltip: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Special Fire Delay
float32.tooltip: delay between special-fire shots (overcharge, banshee bombs) scale factor for enemies. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Guidance vs Player
float32.tooltip: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Guidance vs Player
float32.tooltip: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Guidance vs Player
float32.tooltip: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Guidance vs Player
float32.tooltip: guidance velocity scale factor for all projectiles targeted on a player. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Melee Delay Base
float32.tooltip: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Melee Delay Base
float32.tooltip: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Melee Delay Base
float32.tooltip: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Melee Delay Base
float32.tooltip: delay period added to all melee attacks, even when berserk. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Melee Delay Scale
float32.tooltip: multiplier for all existing non-berserk melee delay times. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Melee Delay Scale
float32.tooltip: multiplier for all existing non-berserk melee delay times. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Melee Delay Scale
float32.tooltip: multiplier for all existing non-berserk melee delay times. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Melee Delay Scale
float32.tooltip: multiplier for all existing non-berserk melee delay times. on impossible difficulty

tagblock.comment: difficulty-affecting values for enemy grenade behavior

float32.name: Easy Grenade Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Grenade Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Grenade Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Grenade Chance Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the desicions to throw a grenade. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Grenade Timer Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Grenade Timer Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Grenade Timer Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Grenade Timer Scale
float32.tooltip: scale factor affecting the delay period between grenades thrown from the same encounter (lower is more often). on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Major Upgrade (Normal)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Major Upgrade (Normal)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Major Upgrade (Normal)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Major Upgrade (Normal)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Major Upgrade (Few)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Major Upgrade (Few)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Major Upgrade (Few)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Major Upgrade (Few)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = normal. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Major Upgrade (Many)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Major Upgrade (Many)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Major Upgrade (Many)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Major Upgrade (Many)
float32.tooltip: fraction of actors upgraded to their major variant when mix = many. on impossible difficulty

float32.name: Easy Player Vehicle Ram Chance
float32.tooltip: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on easy difficulty

float32.name: Normal Player Vehicle Ram Chance
float32.tooltip: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on normal difficulty

float32.name: Hard Player Vehicle Ram Chance
float32.tooltip: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on hard difficulty

float32.name: Impossible Player Vehicle Ram Chance
float32.tooltip: Chance of deciding to ram the player in a vehicle on impossible difficulty

tagblock.name: Rasterizer Data
tagblock.comment: Used internally by the rasterizer. (Do not change unless you know what you're doing)
Used internally by the rasterizer - additive, multiplicative, detail, vector. (Do not change ever, period.)
Used internally by the rasterizer. (Used by Bernie's experimental shaders.)
Used for layers that need to do something for other layers to work correctly if the layer is disabled, also used for active-camo etc.
The PC can't use 3D textures, so we use this instead.

float32.name: Stun Movement Penalty
float32.tooltip: 1.0 prevents moving while stunned

float32.name: Stun Turning Penalty
float32.tooltip: 1.0 prevents turning while stunned

float32.name: Stun Jumping Penalty
float32.tooltip: 1.0 prevents jumping while stunned

float32.name: Minimum Stun Time
float32.tooltip: all stunning damage will last for at least this long

float32.name: Maximum Stun Time
float32.tooltip: no stunning damage will last for longer than this

tagblock.name: Old Materials
tagblock.comment: the following fields modify the way a vehicle drives over terrain of this material type.

float32.name: Ground Friction Scale
float32.tooltip: fraction of original velocity parallel to the ground after one tick

float32.name: Ground Friction Normal K1 Scale
float32.tooltip: cosine of angle at which friction falls off

float32.name: Ground Friction Normal K0 Scale
float32.tooltip: cosine of angle at which friction is zero

float32.name: Ground Depth Scale
float32.tooltip: depth a point mass rests in the ground

float32.name: Ground Damp Fraction Scale
float32.tooltip: fraction of original velocity perpendicular to the ground after one tick

flags32.name: Sweetener Inheritance Flags
flags32.tooltip: when a sweetener inheritance flag is set the sound\effect is not inherited from the parent material. If you leave the sweetener blank and set the flag than no effect\sound will play
